conbody.p: A resource for IRIS is a link that rerurns information based on a uri request. This could be a list of countries, currencies or even a link to a weather forecast.

A resource in T24 can be:
Application
Version
Enquiry

IRIS can use resources from several sources and allow them to be mapped (mashed) into a single screen. This would look like all the data was from a single source, wherase in reality it is from multiple sources.
